info.name: Extend CRM - Calling Extensions API Collection
info.description: Provides a way for apps to add custom calling options to a contact record. This works in conjunction with the [Calling SDK](#), which is used to build your phone/calling UI. The endpoints here allow your service to appear as an option to HubSpot users when they access the *Call* action on a contact record. Once accessed, your custom phone/calling UI will be displayed in an iframe at the specified URL with the specified dimensions on that record.
